document_data.name: The Black Mace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Mace''' was a [[mace]] from the ancient [[Imaskari Empire]]. As of {{yearlink|1360}}, it might be found within the [[Solon#Star Houses|Star Houses]] of Solon.{{cite book/Blood Charge|55}}
document_data.Powers: The Black Mace carried an enchantment of the highest order to increase its deadliness. It rendered the wielder invisible to all [[undead]] and functioned as a powerful priest's [[turn undead|undead turning]] on each blow.
